Articles.Content:
Build a satellite, using the same satellite and orbit get into the following altitudes:

Around Kerbin

Geostationary

2,869,29

11,390,791 Inclination 0

Around The Mun

2004 km

Around Minmus

2004 km Inclination 0

Bonus points awarded for a kerbal at the same orbit around 90 degrees from the satellite, I cant do a manned satellite due to having the zoxygene mod and it will add tons of weight

Some of My screenshots are attached... I'll send the craft file to anyone via pm if they want the satellite I used (Orbiter 3)

Orbiter has MechJeb and Novapunch.

Edited August 7, 2012 by FriedMunCake
